Service Details: Offers a support program for substance addicted mothers
Dates: Mon and Wed: 1:00pm - 4:00pm, and weekly in-home visits (10 week program)
How to Apply: Referrals: Ministry of Children and Family Development, Alcohol & Drug Centre, Public Health
